Text: Thank you for all the trouble you go through for all of us! You're the BEST!

Thanks! :)

all your efforts to bring us these episodes are most definitely appreciated!

And dont worry about the new source problems. We're just glad to be able to see the show at all :)

I'm sure things will be back to normal soon. I hope everything is okay in the states though with all these terrible things happening :(

That hurricane sounded bad

WHAT happened to Ridge?
isnt he coming back?
thanks msfenmore, i dont mind the bigger files. i appreciate you doing this everyday your great !!

@swangpo ... Ridge's last performance was aired on the 14th September. He was written out quickly and bundled off without a tribute befitting a long term actor, one of the Core Four who was in the show from day one. I have a feeling it was sour grapes on Bell's part. Spoilers have leaked that Ridge will be returning, but whether the part will be re-cast or played by Ronn Moss, is not yet known. There are lots of rumours around! Cheers!
